abilities.name: Spores
abilities.description: Infects a target with spores, spreading to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Molt
abilities.description: Sheds a decoy that distracts enemies and explodes when destroyed.

abilities.name: Toxic Lash
abilities.description: Coats melee weapons with toxins, dealing additional Toxin damage.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Releases a deadly toxin in an area, damaging and stunning enemies.

passiveAbility.name: Toxic Avenger
passiveAbility.description: Saryn gains additional status chance with weapons.

abilities.name: Rhino Charge
abilities.description: Charges forward, damaging and knocking down enemies.

abilities.name: Iron Skin
abilities.description: Hardens Rhino's skin, providing a protective barrier.

abilities.name: Stomp
abilities.description: Stomps the ground, causing a shockwave that suspends enemies.

abilities.name: Roar
abilities.description: Emits a war cry, buffing the damage of Rhino and nearby allies.

passiveAbility.name: Heavy Landing
passiveAbility.description: Rhino creates shockwaves upon landing from a significant height.

augmentMods.name: Iron Shrapnel
augmentMods.description: Iron Skin can be detonated to damage nearby enemies.
